entries: You have long been gifted with the ability to see and speak with the departed. This could have manifested at your birth or when a chance encounter linked you inextricably to the spirits of the dead. Their constant presence might feel like a curse, or it might provide you with welcome companionship.
You gain one ability boost. It must be to Constitution or Wisdom.
You're trained in {@skill Religion} and {@skill Lore||Undead Lore}. You gain the effects of the {@spell spirit sense|APG} spell at all times.
